data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio do Maracana have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 3, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Important block from the Atletico Mineiro defence as Gerson fires in a strike for Flamengo.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio do Maracana.
Raphael Claus awards the away team a throw-in.
Bruno Henrique hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Flamengo!
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 10, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Flamengo.
In the minute 15, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 18, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Flamengo's Everton Ribeiro is on target but unsuccessful.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 21, Flamengo are coming forward and Gabriel Barbosa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Raphael Claus awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 24, Atletico Mineiro drive upfield and Guilherme Arana gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
Filipe Luis has the misfortune to make it 0-1 through an own goal.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 26, Flamengo drives forward and Giorgian De Arrascaeta gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Flamengo.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 28, Raphael Claus awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 31, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gerson of Flamengo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
In the minute 32, Flamengo's Giorgian De Arrascaeta misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Flamengo are pushing forward but Giorgian De Arrascaeta's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio do Maracana.
Flamengo drive forward but Bruno Henrique is judged offside.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 36, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Alan Franco (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atletico Mineiro pushes forward through Jefferson Savarino, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 38, Can Flamengo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Gabriel (Atletico Mineiro) gets a yellow card.
Bruno Henrique (Flamengo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 40, Raphael Claus awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Flamengo's Gabriel Barbosa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Atletico Mineiro defender.
Raphael Claus signals a throw-in for Flamengo, close to Atletico Mineiro's area.
In the minute 42, Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Raphael Claus signals a Flamengo throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
In the minute 43, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Jair replacing Gabriel.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 45, Free kick in a good position for Flamengo!
Flamengo push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Gabriel Barbosa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atletico Mineiro defence.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Raphael Claus blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Atletico Mineiro are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Bruno Henrique for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Flamengo.
Gabriel Barbosa for Flamengo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Gabriel Barbosa (Flamengo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Atletico Mineiro's Guilherme Arana gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Rio de Janeiro Atletico Mineiro's Nathan is caught offside.
In the minute 59, Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In Rio de Janeiro Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Marquinhos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 60, Raphael Claus signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Pedro is replacing Giorgian De Arrascaeta for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Atletico Mineiro's Allan breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Guga, who is grimacing with pain.
Bruno Henrique is booked for the home team.
In the minute 65, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Guga is back on his feet again.
In the minute 66, Atletico Mineiro's Marquinhos has run offside.
In Rio de Janeiro, Nathan of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 67, The away team have replaced Jefferson Savarino with Bueno. This is the second substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a third substitution, with Marrony replacing Marquinhos.
Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a fourth substitution, with Hyoran replacing Alan Franco.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 70, Marrony gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico Mineiro.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio do Maracana, Allan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 73, Rafinha (Flamengo) has received a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Everton Ribeiro with Michael. This is the second substitution made today by Domenec Torrent Font.
Raphael Claus signals a Flamengo throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 78, Raphael Claus awards the away team a throw-in.
Flamengo's Michael gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 79, Raphael Claus awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
The away team replace Nathan with Marcos Franca.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Flamengo make their third substitution with Vitinho replacing Gerson.
In the minute 81, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick Flamengo.
In the minute 82, Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 83, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 86, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Flamengo are coming forward and Vitinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio do Maracana.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Raphael Claus signals a Flamengo throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
In the minute 89, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Can Flamengo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico Mineiro's half?
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo surge into the attack at Estadio do Maracana but Vitinho’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's full-time at Estadio do Maracana. The final score is 0-1.
Pedro (Flamengo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
